publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1724 Mr Gil Paterson: Schools Repairs Fund—That the Parliament notes the considerable outstanding repair bill faced by Scottish schools which in some cases have been allowed to fall into an unacceptable state of disrepair simply because local authorities cannot afford the necessary investment for improvement; draws attention to Airdrie Academy as an example of a school whose major repair requirements have provoked a crisis; and calls on the Scottish Executive to allocate funding for a schools repair contingency fund to ensure that local authorities can afford to educate our children in decent and safe surroundings.
